title: Thresh just hooked me through Morgana's Black Shield
body: the patch from yesterday caused this. this scenario only happened once. the other times the black shield worked fine. there was no other magic damage that could have broken the black shield....i'm 100% hook went straight through the black shield on its own. people in the game said morgana is bugged jsut thought i'd help sperad the word. fk typos

replies.body: There's currently a bug with Morgana's Black Shield where, if a spell deals enough damage to break the shield, it'll then apply its CC to the target. In prior patches even a 1 health black shield would block the CC as the shield broke by contrast. We're working on a fix for that at the moment, it's definitely not an intended change.

shouldn't that be a good thing? the idea of the added shield blocks spell damage and cc, but only when there is remaining health on the shield. When the skill hits it should check how much damage it does, and if the shield still has health, then set the cc to fail, else having the cc overpower the shield and apply the cc fully.

this would balance her so she either has to input points in it so that the shield cannot be broken and cc can get through, making the only champ with a lasting spell shield have some counterplay other than long cooldowns on the skill.
